Evaluation: Uncertainty Visualization

INTRODUCTION

Tractography on DTI data reconstructs the white matter structure, however, the results are sensitive to multiple sources of error that add non-uniform variations, hence, making the fiber tract results unreliable. In our work, we show the possible variations that a fiber tract can have due to the uncertainty involved in the workflow. The goal of this evaluation is to find out whether showing the possible variations due to uncertainty affects the decision-making process in surgery planning.


Have you ever used tractography in your patients?

years

Do you think that the use of tractography can potentially change clinical decision-making in your patients?
